name: Performance Weapon Mastery
text: You wield all your weapons with the flair of a performer.
benefit: You treat all weapons you are proficient in as if they had the performance weapon quality (page 144).
staminaText: As long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool, you treat all weapons—not just the ones you are proficient with—as if they had the performance weapon quality.
text_zh: 你能手持任何武器进行华丽的表演。
benefit_zh: 你能将你擅长的任何类型的武器用于演武。
staminaText_zh: 只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能将你的所有武器——不只是你擅长的——视为拥有演武UC武器特性。
